column5: Not us Geoff.. I've even tentatively given up my own spot on Lloyd's boat.

Well I hope you can make it Wayne.  Seen enough pic's of your mug and read enough reports to feel that I know you.  I know times are not well so you do what you need to do and we can shake hands another time then if we must wait.

Won't know until late Wednesday night if I'll be heading to Lloyd's Thursday. Jen's Chemo is Monday/Tuesday and we'll see how the first one goes. Lexxington is "batter up" for my spot and a welcomed extra if I indeed make it down.
You do what you need to do Wayne.  The fish will be there for years to come...
The way I've seen Joe fish.. you've got that right...
He looks like that at work too!  LOL!!! He must per-ma-sleep or need to see an eye doctor...
ANYONE KEEPING A BOAT ON THE TIP OF THE BAY DOCKS ITS $15 A NIGHT. PAYMENT CAN BE GIVEN TO ME OR PEGGY FROM TIP OF THE BAY WILL ALSO WILL BE CHECKING BOATS FOR PAYMENT.
Hey, a report from the crew who went out with LLoyd last weekend would be nice.... HH
LOL I WAS THINKING THE SAME THING
me too
does that give us access to hydro hookups?
yes
Me too and I was one of the crew!!  LINCOLN!!!  Where's the report?  You've got all the pics and video.  It was a great day on the water, fish caught, lots of laughs.
Highest bidder!  Who's got a spot in a Quinte-bound boat this w/e?!??  ...  ....   ......  ...I'll get it up when I can - lotta pix to go thru...and things like work impeded progress!!

We (the group at P-VUE) are looking for a spot in a boat for Skeeter (Dann) so he can come up for the fun.  Anyone have room?  We only have room for 5 people in the 2 boats and Dann makes 6.  Can anyone help out here?
Check your PM Geoff... I might need a bed and bring my boat
Got it and I sent you both numbers to get a hold of me.  If we don't talk tonight, I'll msg you my work number too.
STILL WAITING TO SEE POST AND PICS
wheres every-body staying,id like ta meet you lads and say hello..
We have 10 or so ppl at Perfect Vue Resort
http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=48458
a bunch of us are staying @ perfect vue resort as well.
How much the four person cost>?
Come on guys!!  My wife gave permission to go..   HELP!!!   Let me in!!!  Randy

Randy - I think there'd be room for ya somewhere in a cabin.  If my two buds are in and we get the four man, we'll have room for one.  Ok - so do I need to get on this a book a fourman at Perfect Vu or is it still be held.  I don't know what's goin on.
I'm good.    Lincoln is a good guy Randy...just sleep with one eye open.. Hopefully you guys can sort something out.
What's perfect Vu's #????

(613) 354-3001 Ask for Joe and tell him it's cabin 3 that Joe/Geoff and crew moved from.  Book it and then we can get Randy to have a bed too.  Cost, I forget.  We can all take the grand toal and split it at the end so it's equal for everyone?  Just an idea...  Randy, get Wayne to fly you down if he is going to make the trip.
L/M
He'd have to push Geoff.. my engine has no cylinders on it!

I just got off the phone with Joe @ Perfect Vue Resort and I have the cabin held for you.  We have cabin 5 and you have cabin 3.  There is a fire pit between our cabin's as well as a fire pit down by the docks.  In total for the two cabin's we are looking at $791.00 (after taxes) / x # of people from the 19th to 21st.  We are all set and so are you.  Again, Gerrit, Bitsmith, HH and fishnsled; are we good with that change?   Randy, we have room left for one more if you want to make the long treck.
Randy, get the Mrs to hook up a toe rope to the truck so you can glide the whole way down
boats, planes... no engines...
You picked a bad crew, HAHAHAHA
After talking to my higher power... (Joe) I think we can accommodate you're "friends"  so long as you play nice... (boondock Saints theme...) LOL
Bring lot's of "fuel" to keep you (and others) to keep you going
Was away for a few drinks, but I'm black now.  Gerritt - are you talking to me - about all three??
You're black now... a minute ago you were a lesbian!!
Both.  Column B...Column L...

randy, we were fine in my 14' last year, and we'll be out in it again this year.. we didnt have to go too far from the resort! really hope the weather is comparable though..   i'm good with that.. more people for Gerritt to trash talk to in his sleep.. just remember to tell everyone to keep the smiling to a minimum..
you guys kill me lol mike you going to have a repeat of last year?
it's a strong possibility...

Yah, I'm pretty sure that Mike will catch another double digit eye! That would be the ideal "repeat". Randy, if you can find someone to come down with you, we have room for one in the cottage (w/bed) and one on the couch! I'm pretty confident that if you can make it, we will have a decent time!LOL ... and nothing wrong with being a Lesbian Lincoln... rugs need to be cleaned to.. yah know! HH
Well Jeez, does that mean I'll have to drive to your fire now
Does anyone have boat space for Skeeter?  We have cabin space at P-Vue, he just needs a ride out on the water if anyone can fit him.  Plz let us know, cheers. Geoff
anyone?
Oh man Lew... Sorry you can't make it Lew and Phil... hopefully someone with some space can chime in here. HH
HOLY LEW, that is absolutely brutal.  I (and I know you) would of been LIVID.  I am sad to say it was I that had to cancel, as my lil sweetie has a date with sick kids on the friday unfortunatley.

We'll do the g2g next year Phil, cept we'll booked into a more reliable place.  HH, the guy that messed up my reservation is probably the same guy that told you the day before he had no rooms available, then told Joey the same day he had 3
That's probably a fair assumtion Lew... now I know why may hair stands up every time I hear that name... HH

Ok, anyone have some money to invest?  We'll set up a fishing lodge somewhere on the Bay for year round adventures.  We have some guides with expereince on here we can hire, plus we can use my old contacts from the states and hit the US show circut.  We can have seasonal OFC GTG's aswell.  We can do it right.  I am half joking....

That's just awful Lew.  I booked mine, they ASKED for my credit card number and then they sent me a confirmation email stating the date and cottage booked.  Don't know who this moron is who is giving others a hard time, but I'll definately have a word with Jennifer and Kevin.  Not like it will matter anyhow, but something should be said.  Joey

We book motels a couple times a year and they nearly always ask for a card #, infact I'm booked into a motel in Chatham this weekend and just gave my # this morning.  That's why I was surprised when the guy at Merlands said he didn't require my # and I even  told my wife about it.  Oh well, it'll be the last time I ever offer to give my $$$$ to those folks, I'm sure some other resort would appreciate it more.
REDEMPTION!!!!!!!!!!!!! HH

So many things to learn grasshopper.    BLACKLISTED!! And you wanted to come fishing with me eh..... As for the boat being fixed, Should be ready in the Spring. One disabled boat is not top of the list when you have dozens to winterize. One upset guy or an angry mob?    You can have all the tools but if you don't know how to use them, what good are they?    It might have been open water in the Kawarthas? You might be thinking of Ken. Was I hungover? Must be an age thing.    Sorry to hear that you and Phil cannot make the trip. More sorry that Merlands just about ruined your weekend.  UNREAL!!!!!!

Yes!  Open Water Kawarthas!  And Ken! And fish whistles!  Holy shniekies - I remember that hangover - but if I've got the opportunity, I'm not passin' up on fishin'!!  Yep - rip jigged for eyes, floated for crappies...I believe it was Balsam?  Dunno.  Doesn't matter.  IT'S QUINTE, NOW!  - Like hearing about Merland Parks' disorganization - good to avoid places like that.  Imagine showin' up and being told "Who are you?"  *queit little twig snaps*  It's called a computer folks.  Get one.  Sorry to hear about someone visiting sick kids - hopefully none too serious.  Whatever the case - they're the best in the world!
Grasshopper - ha!  I read the emails, not the posts - so much lost in translations!  I thought grasshopper was referring to learning to avoid Merland! lol
And PS!  I could teach you a thing or two about using 'tool'...but i'm afraid you'd take me up on the offer!!  (Damn...I need to read everything!)
OK, looks like I am all set for the 19th weekend. See everyone there  thanks  Lexx
LincolnG, are you coming with us then?  If so, we need to figure out the boat situation and we will need to move to the bigger cabin (if we can)

Sorry to hear you are off to Sick Kids Phil.. been there done that, but they are GREAT people and will take the bestest care of your little sweetie. Good chance I'll be across the street at Mount Sinai with one of our little sweeties, now 25, at the same time and if so maybe we need to do lunch or supper.  Lexx, great that you'll be aboard the U and Me express fishing machine with the motley crew. I hope that I'm there as well to enjoy a much needed weekend.. but we'll see where we are at come Thursday the 18th.

Well - I think, as of right now, I've filled a spot in my buddy's boat - comin down Next weekend and the week after...week after being the GTG, if I'm I've not had TMR.  We were thinkin' about squatting at a no-tell motel, but the cabin thing would be way better - cause we could whistle and drink with y'all.  (Prol. more drinkin'...).  But there would be three of us.  Don't know how that would work and don't wanna be a PITA.  But would DEF. like to get in on the comradarie.  So, if three of us could be accomodated, I think that would be AWESOME.  I'm not fussy...I can pass out drunk anywhere!  There other two guys (one older in spirit, one just older) are good dudes - father/son in law team - they'd prolly want a bed.  So...thoughts??

I am so willing to go ... are there any OFC Northerners that are going ? I'll split on gas and lodging... or we can take my stuff and vice versa....  I have a Medium 14' maybe something bigger would be best ..I'll bring the Expedition and hook up your boat.. If ya want...50/50 or 33.33/33.33/33.33 or 25/25/25/25  ...whatever Let me know .. time is running out.   Randy
And we have seen a couple of those!!!!  But as always we cannot talk about it!
Why would you want to give your hard earned money to a place that is run by a poacher?(Merland"s)
Anybody?   Randy

Sad to hear you could make it Lew! it has been awhile... Seems a bunch were willing to give them a second chance.... perhaps it is only the odd person that gets the gears???.. some did not believe us about our experiance.. perhaps more do now.  Wish I could have shaken you're hand again...  and whatever the issue is.. I hope it is not too serious!  G

We have the 6 person cabin now.  I'm sure you can find a spot on the _____ to crash.  Thos is need, there is now a 4 person cabin left at Perfect Vue Resort (cause we just switched).  Maybe the father/son-in-law want the other room for a good night sleep?
Gerrit, Bitsmith, HH and fishnsled; we good with that change?

"We have the 6 person cabin now. I'm sure you can find a spot on the _____ to crash. Thos is need, there is now a 4 person cabin left at Perfect Vue Resort (cause we just switched). Maybe the father/son-in-law want the other room for a good night sleep? "  (obviously don't know how to quote like the cool kids)  Ok, I'll admit to being a touch confused. (TMR)  (I don't know what "Thos is need" means.lol)  I'll be a party of 3 partiers (inclusive) and we will have our own boat.  So no boat worries there.  Now, as for lodgings - what's available - at what cost, and what do I need to do here? lol  Many thanks -the newb.

I am sort of confused too! lol! I think that Geoff means to say is that we have upgraded to a 6 person cabin and there is a 4 person available @ perfectvu now that we have upgraded?  Not really quite sure....  But if they have a cabin, and you have a boat. I am sure you can get all pie eyed too! Bwahahahahahahhahahahahahaa!  G.  Randy hopefully you can find a partner!  G
and then it drops

Iam looking to catch a ride up to picton Friday and be home sunday. If anyone has room , It'll save me fighting with the wife for the car!!! I use my company truck normally but cant take it to picton and she cant drive the company truck sooommmmmmmm  I can get a ride to a meeting area somewhere along 401 from gueph to T.o.... or somewhere.....  Let me know thanks  Brad.

For all wondering fishing is just getting better and better. Friday was good till wind picked up then sat and sunday were great with all fish coming in the C&R ZONE. Looking forward to 3 days of fun fishing with my misfit crew this year lol
misfit crew, I thought you were going to fish with us.......LOL     can't wait
Misfits.. yep.. he's talking about Jose again! Hope I'm part of the crew as well.....
the new guy always gets picked on

Hey All:  Sorry, don't you hate it when life and work overtakes fishing !@!!  I should be there but have not made any arrangements so far, if anyone has room in their boat I know how to crew.. I have been know to catch a fish or 2  If not I hope I can prep the boat in time. Any space out there for roomies? PM me please  Thanks  LeXX
yeah ain't it great, I get a break from being the whipping boy.....LOL
Terry your still the whipping boy come winter lol But for now i'll take over
NAAA.. Terry's moved on from that position at the lake... I hear you bought a sled Jose, so maybe you can be next in line!!
On the way Paul..

I just read all that.  lol  What IS GTG?  Good to go?  So many damn acronyms!  At any rate - I love where GBW's (ANOTHER acronym) head is at!  I don't have a boat, but I may have weaseled into a friends boat for that weekend.  I don't know ANY of you, but y'all seem alright.  Lied.  I know FNS (FishNSled) - Will - if you wind up drinkin' down there, let me know.  Actually, let me know ahead of time, and I'll try and stay near where you're crashin' and then CRASH THIS PARTY!!! (I don't make my own beer.  crap, I don't even LIKE beer.  But I love, love, LOVE Rye!!)  Yeah, so, here's more to read for the next clueless noob.

K, I'm obviously not really in tune with how the boards work - scrolled up after I posted and saw a lot of posts I didn't see before.  Now I REALLY don't know if I'm making any sense.  Too. Much. Rye. (TMR)
Get 2 Gether
Damn... and I was always drawn to these things because I thought it stood for Gorgeous Topless Gals....

Oh no, you know Will?!?!  Ok, black listed!      Will is with a few of us at Perfect Vu, unless things change.  Rye, ok, maybe.  Fish Whistle?  (If that one you don't know ask Will, LOL)  The rest I cannot talk to because this is my 1st year with the group.  PM headhunter to see about a cabin change to a bigger place.  If not, PM me and I'll bug him     All I know is our boats are now full unless Will changes his plans (ie: fix his boat).
All I wanna know Geoff.. is it time?
HAHA, I'm    my pants worried about hidden "comments" that I have yet to learn...  HAHA
PS, there is no wrong time for a whistle.

Fish whistle?  Is that the same as a queef?  Topless Gals?!  Irishfield, I rish that's what it did stand for.  Girls who fish are HAWT!  Topless girls who fish?!  Well, let's just say I'd be fishing with an extra long rod!  I'm going to watch HeadHunter and Will sift up big chunks of Quinte gold on Sunday.  I'll see about all this then....
Ask Mary-J Wait, this weekend?!?!  Those buggars!

LincolnG... well, I usually don't admitt these types of things on an open forum like this, but I have fished with you a couple of winters ago... out with Will on Lady Simcoe for Whities! As far as the Quinte GTG is concerned, we can almost always find a way to fit in one more... but boat space may be a problem... Get ahold of Will, he knows what we are up to and we can go from there! HH

Really, HH?  ShEoot...I only remember one outing with Will on Simk for W&L...and it was just a romantic outing w me n him.  But I have been know to drink.  And drink has been known to erase memory.  Did I take a butt-load of pix and vidy (my motto: "Capture the moment.  All of them."), cuz that would have been me.  Was I unbelievably handsome?  Cuz that wouldn't have been me.  Either way...I'll remember the next time.  Because the next time, *ALL* of us are going to pull PB's outta that bay!  Dammit!  We'll talk Sunday about stuff'n'things!  I'm 'kid-in-a-topless-candy-store' excited!

We picked you up in Will's truck, you were some what "over served" the previous night and passed out in the back of Will's truck, until we got to Simcoe... then you fished like a trooper all day! Let me know when you find a topless candy store, that would peak my interest! HH

Myself and Harrison had cabin 7 booked at Merland Park for the November G2G but somethings come up and we have to cancel, unfortunately.  Probably a good thing though cause I just called Merland Park to cancel our reservation for cabin 7 only to be told that I must be mistaken because it's already booked to ANOTHER party and they have no record of me ever calling.........UN-BELIEVABLE !!!!  I told her the reservation was made back in September and when I offered the guy my credit card number over the phone he told me they don't take card numbers but not to worry cause he marked me in the reservation book himself and I was all set.  If your booked at Merlands, ya better check.  They received some really bad OFC reviews a couple years ago for this very same crap but it would appear as if nothing has improved there at all.
The shepherd must tend his flock    All kidding aside, do you blame him...that is one cosey set-up!!
maybe he could live there  but do women come on his boat..........          I'm just saying

I laffed when I saw that. I wonder how many guys (and girls) from the business sector have that book on a shelf somewhere. I picked it up years ago because of the title and how perfectly it described my mgmt role.  JF
BitSmith... I wonder what concoction we can look forward too this year...  Inquiring minds need to know!

g! i'm thinking that store bought beer will be my preference this year.. i think the kegged beer was bad luck,  may have been the reason for my skunk.. looking forward to doing another terri schiavo impersonation up there!
I'am looking forward to meeting you guys and having a few!!

That is wrong on so many levels! but also funny as all hell! LOL!  Dont let me forget you're anchor this time!!!!!! I still have it with the 10 or so feet of nylon rope attached to it.. (were you using it as a drift sock? LOL)  tell you what... make me some beer.. then the fish gods will praise you for you're generosity!  May the Beer the strong. and the THC even stronger.  G.
Look forward to seeing you again to Buster! I still have that Skidoo, although it is in my ex's backyard still LOL!  G.
dont forget to invite me
It was either that or that waxy look on your face...
we're at the picton inn, whats happen'n saturday night?
if you can make a beer like Guinness, please do make some.  G is right and the fish AND beer god's will be happy. to bad it's only Oct. 21 right now...

so i guess its gonna be real lonely in here this weekend.I'm definately in for next year.I should be better equiped, wetsuit,bigger boat, warm undies. i dont drink, but i party hardy.anyone make root beer.......just asking
NO NO... it's a month from now...
nov  i thought it was oct.....sorry.
That could have been my fault.  It's only Oct 21 now and I wish it was Nov 19 tomorrow.
Roy, can this thread be stuck now?  It's been 17 days since you said it needed 15 more days...  See you at the VU!  or out on the water...

i know i've got an untapped keg in the basement, we'll see whats in it this weekend.. i dont think i've got the time to get anything else together   doesnt everyone get that face after spending that much time with headhunter?   i can definately make it, but there's not much of a chance of it being drinkable by the g2g. .
Sure, blame the "guide" for everything! LMAO HH
Speaking of guide, are you still in touch with Gustar?  Haven't seen him around in a while.
And Mike no smiling that weekend. I mean it, or things could get ugly!
i'll try my best g, but something in the air up there gives me a perma-smile.. any ideas what it is joe?
FISH WHISTLE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! HH
You mean it's not the lemons....
I'am in, my friend JEAN HENRY and myself, have to call back in 1hr to see if motel room still available.
Iam looking to borrow or buy a float suit
Iam booked picton    Inn 19th and 20th
Monday morning bump! (For those who don't know, but might be interested!) HH
BUMP ROY MAYBE PIN THIS ONE AT THE TOP
Sorry Lloyd, can't for another 15 days but in the meantime I'll take it to the top from time to time.
*bump* anyone else coming?  I got the green light to go up Friday

well time for a bump. New member to my crew/team for this weekend is Jose. He will be the new Bubble Boy now that Dano can't make it this year. Dano will be missed this year but our team of Wayne Terry and myself think that Jose can do a great job as bubble boy this year. With lots of movies we are sure we will only see him when the words "FISH ON" are called    lol
I know you're the Captain and it's your boat.. and you get to chose the mates.. BUT Jose??
lmao
who is this Jose guy is he anything like that hosey guy you talk about    LOL
So who has booked cottages so far at Perfect Vue?  Myself and my cousin will be there staying in our trailers as part of the quintefishing.com G2G.  Looking forward to meeting some of you!
I'm booked there with Headhunter and crew
Irish make sure he has his fishing licence on him before you leave port!
Not my boat that's getting seized.. I don't care...
people might want to check their insurance policies.. I just found out my lay up period is Nov. 15 to April 1st....  great..  G
RSA First Mate is Dec 1st to April 1st East of the Ontario/Manitoba border. That won't stop me from Muskie fishing into December if I can get her in the water.
bump

Going to miss you guys by a couple weeks. We're leaving this Friday morning 8 guys for 3 days Picton Harbor Inn. By the look of the reports, I should be catching my favorite fish S.H.  I think the Gap should be a good start for the Bigins,I hope. Anyone else on here doing a early trip?
IM ON MY BOAT EVERY WEEKEND
you live on your boat
WTG Lew and Phil, looking forward to seeing you both!

Thanks Roy, lookin forward to it, I haven't made the fall trip since our 1st g2g 4 or 5 years ago.  I also asked about the reserved docks and was told that no, none will be reserved but there will be enough for everyone...hopefully.
Merlands Park better hope they dont goof up. OFC word,gets around.
Booked at PerfectVu with Joe, GBW and Bitsmith Looking forward to it Gents!  G
Hey Gerritt, I have a trailer at Perfect Vue, what weekend are you guys coming?
Me and walleyedreamer will be at Merland from nov 6 -nov 13.we have been doing this week for the last six years ! One day we will make it to the quinte g2g !!
that is the quintefishing.com g2g as well that weekend so I will see you guys here
HAHA, amazing and this could get messy...
I nominate the previous weekend instead.
Looking forward to seeing you Lew

As Grateful Fisherman said, that's the weekend for Quintefishing G2G.  "this year we will have the get together at Perfect Vue cottages with hosts Joanne and Larry. The date will be Friday November 19th-Sunday November 21st. In addition Sheldon Hatch aka Eye Tracker will join us Saturday evening at the Perfect Vue Rec centre, with computer, overhead and slide projector in hand, to give us a seminar on fall walleye trolling tactics. Its going to be a great weekend"  It's also the Santa Claus parade in TO and my grandsons birthday - guess where I will be??????
Hopefully fishing Superdad  I would be happy with spending my Birthday out on the boat with my grandpa

Well Brian, I would say based on my experience of yesterday, they are not off to a good start! I followed up with them this morning, trying to understand how I was refused a cottage, only to find out that both Joey and Lew were able to book, when I was refused hours earlier... After much appologizing for the "mix up" I'm still left scratching my head.  So, we will have yet another dis-funtional GTG as again this year, we will not be together as a group. HH I hope the Quinte Fishing board group like beer!
I bet they saw your shirt.  We aren't to far from each other bud.

Well, your at least partially right Phil, we really aren't that far, but we certainly are far enough away based on the volumes of BEER that are going to be consumed and knowing the group I'll be with, no one is going to volunteer to be the DD! RE the shirt... as a wise mod once said to me... "You know joe, not everyone could get away with wearing a shirt like that" HH

Hey Joe, I wonder if you and I were even talking to the same guy yesterday. When I called in the afternoon there was no hesitation at all when he said they had one small cabin and 2 motel units still available.

I don't know Lew... all I can say is what was said to me. I was not asked how many people I needed a cottage for...I was told in no uncertain terms that there were no cottages available for that weekend... and I called at around 11:00am, yesterday.  I'm wondering if there may be a "non drinker" who wouldn't mind picking up some drunken fools and driving us to Merlands so we can at least get some time together as a group... but I suspect that there aren't that many fools around! HH
LOL....I've been called a lot of things Joe but "wise" is a new one for me.....  But I do stand firmly behind the quoted comment.....
HH
If it is not too far, I might be inclined to do that, being a non-drinker, especially just picking up, but if its too late dropping off, maybe a taxi would work?  Just don't call me a fool
You're too kind Joey! And no, I wouldn't call you a fool! At least not until we get dropped off back at Perfect Vue! Just a joke folks, just a joke! HH
WELL LOOKS LIKE IM IN AGAIN. GOT MY TEAM TOGETHER. WAYNE, DAN AND MYSELF THINK I MAY ASK THAT TERRY GUY LOL WE ARE IN FOR FRI SAT SUN. JOE CALL ME TONIGHT ON MY CELL ILL BE ON MY BOAT IN PICTON
Will do Lloyd! Good to see that you got the group back together... should be fun! HH
OK WE ARE BOOKED INTO THE PICTON HARBOUR INN NOV 19, 20. WAYNE, DANO, MYSELF AND OH YA TERRY
let's just say lot's of people and they all drink a lot.  it's more of the gathering then the fishing for some.  FYI this is my 1st year (if I can make it).

So who else wants to join in the fun? There's still a bit of time to get your acts together but reservations will need to be made. Boat spots should be available for everyone. Cold and wind are usually there as well at that time of the year so warm, waterproof clothing are important. Floatsuits are almost indispensable. Let's hear your plans.

There is a chance of this happeneing for me.Where are people staying,not much of a camper in November in Canada.Will prolly need a spot in a boat or I could bring a boat but will need someone to guide me to those monster walleyes. Joe

Joe, I think the plan this year is Merland Park and it's a cabin, not a tent   I could be wrongm on the location though...  As for the boat, I'm sure there are many folks here that can help you find the spots if you did bring your boat.
Dang, Joe! If you could make it, it would make the whole GTG much more worthwhile for everyone! Give me some news!
Well if us newlyweds can drag ourselves from the bedroom long enough, we'll probably go  Joey

What place has the fire pit?  I think it's going to be needed as there are so mane new folks (like me) who want to go.  Where's the best place to sit and chat (other then in a boat) with new 'friends'?  A FIRE...  After all, we need a few garbage can's with ice for all the keg's thatleetboy is going to bring so we need some space outside by a fire...  PS, so far I'm in as I checked with the Mrs and as far as we know there is no family functions that weekend.

OR, can we make a fire pit? As far as I'm concerned my bed is a place for a few hours and the rest of the time is for fishing and fun.  I don't care where we go.  Fishing + OFC folks + Beer + fire = a hell of a good time in my mind...
Merland Park in Picton.
Thanks Joey, now get back to the newlywed thing would ya...
Here's the link to Merland Park. http://www.merlandpark.com/
What about Perfect Vue Resort?
i could be wrong, but you possibly sold me a couple kegs late last winter/early spring, that have been awesome brew keggles for me..
Might have been me. I do remember selling a pair to a guy who said he was really into fishing!

I called Merlands this morning, they say they are booked solid for the weekend of the 19th, 20th and 21st. NO COTTAGES AVAILABLE!!!! I have booked myself and Bitsmith into Perfect Vue for those dates. I believe that they have more cottages available... they can be reached at 613 354 3001. FishnSled, my cottage sleeps four, should you be able to get away! HH
